mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) VALUES (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET reply = #{reply}, updateDate = current_date WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT /*+ index_asc(tbl_reply) */ * FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} OFFSET (#{cri.currPage} - 1 ) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY
